scripts.deploy-clean: rimraf README.md src public .babelrc webpack.config.js package.json package-lock.json
scripts.deploy-prep: git branch -f gh-pages && git checkout gh-pages && git reset --hard origin/master && npm run build && cp -r dist/* . && npm run deploy-clean
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-prep && git add -A && git commit -m "gh-pages deploy" && git push origin gh-pages --force && git checkout master
